match.title: 6th Match
match.statusText: Bangladesh won by 6 wickets (with 42 balls remaining)

image.caption: A view of Clontarf, Dublin
image.longCaption: A view of Clontarf, Ireland v West Indies, Dublin, July 14, 2007

match.hoursInfo: 10.45 start, First Session 10.45-14.15 Interval 14.15-15.00, Second Session 15.00-18.30

headshotImage.caption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Liton Das b Abu Jayed
dismissalText.commentary: Paul Stirling c Liton Das b Abu Jayed 130 (141b 8x4 4x6) SR: 92.19

dismissalComment.html: back of the hand slower ball, and it lands full on leg stump. Stirling tries to muscle this over cow corner, but he doesn't have the power behind the shot. In the air for eternity before the sweeper-fielder on the leg side gets under it. Jayed strikes again. Standing ovation for Stirling

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Liton Das b Abu Jayed
dismissalText.commentary: William Porterfield c Liton Das b Abu Jayed 94 (106b 7x4 2x6) SR: 88.67

dismissalComment.html: holes out at extra cover! Falls just short of a hundred. This was full and wide outside off, and Porterfield tries to slap it over the off side. But fielder in the deep runs across the boundary line and slides across the grass to complete a catch. Excellent innings

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: end of a promising innings. And what a terrible way to go. Looks to take on the short ball but this doesn't come on and he's through with the stroke, cramped for room. Did he get a little globve on the way through to Mushfiqur? No conclusive proof. Given out so he has to go. Oh, there's no review. How unfortunate? Richard Kettleborough the umpire in question.

holes out at extra cover! Falls just short of a hundred. This was full and wide outside off, and Porterfield tries to slap it over the off side. But fielder in the deep runs across the boundary line and slides across the grass to complete a catch. Excellent innings
got him! Back of a length on middle, and O'Brien tries to flat-bat a six over long on. But he toe-ends the shot, and it's gone straight to the man riding the boundary

back of the hand slower ball, and it lands full on leg stump. Stirling tries to muscle this over cow corner, but he doesn't have the power behind the shot. In the air for eternity before the sweeper-fielder on the leg side gets under it. Jayed strikes again. Standing ovation for Stirling
Jayed has the last laugh! Full on middle, and the attempted cover drive is sliced to point. Five-wicket haul

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Saifuddin  player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Saifuddin  player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: hit wicket! Full, just outside off, and the attempted drive through the off side is missed. But Adair is so deep in his crease that he chops off stump with his bat

bowled around his legs! Full on middle, and Dockrell exposes his stumps trying to play another paddle. Ball crashes into middle stump and Saifuddin bowls a tidy over to end the innings. Ireland finish on 292 for 8

dismissalText.long: c Liton Das b Rubel Hossain
dismissalText.commentary: James McCollum c Liton Das b Rubel Hossain 5 (10b 1x4 0x6) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: got him! Taken at first slip. Length ball, wide outside off and McCollum goes fishing. Tries to punch off the back foot, and this has taken the outside edge. Disappointing for the man who scored a hundred against Bangladesh in the A-game

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Andy Balbirnie c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Abu Jayed 20 (20b 4x4 0x6) SR: 100

dismissalComment.html: end of a promising innings. And what a terrible way to go. Looks to take on the short ball but this doesn't come on and he's through with the stroke, cramped for room. Did he get a little globve on the way through to Mushfiqur? No conclusive proof. Given out so he has to go. Oh, there's no review. How unfortunate? Richard Kettleborough the umpire in question.

dismissalText.commentary: Litton Das b McCarthy 76 (67b 9x4 1x6) SR: 113.43

dismissalComment.html: breakthrough! The stumps are broken. Liton 24 short of a hundred. Was a full ball, but slightly slower, and Liton's through his shot too early. Smart delivery

headshotImage.caption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal b Rankin 57 (53b 9x4 0x6) SR: 107.54

dismissalComment.html: chopped on! Ireland needed one badly and they have one. Tamim with a feeble push away form the body

headshotImage.caption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: chopped on! Ireland needed one badly and they have one. Tamim with a feeble push away form the body
sharp take from the keeper! Breaks the partnership. Full on middle, and going down leg. Mushfiqur tries to flick, but it takes his glove and Wilson dives to his left to take a one-handed stunner

dismissalComment.html: healthy nick and gone! Was looking to guide this down to third man, instead picks out the keeper who takes an excellent catch. Second ODI wicket for Adair.

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: that's the end of that, steps out and hoicks this across the line to the wide long-on boundary. That's the end of that. Ireland are winless at the end of the tri-series, Bangladesh have made light work of this target.

commentPostTextItems.html: 6.10pm A berth in the final was already set up, but Bangladesh have been switched on all day. Yes, they saw Ireland put up stiff resistance courtesy Paul Stirling's century, but once they got past him, they tied the hosts into knots quite expertly. Abu Jayed's five-for should settle any doubts - if ever, they exist - while Liton's form after he replaced the rested Soumya Sakar should enthuse the team management. Tamim was his usual self, but they will be concerned with Shakib's side strain that forced him to retire hurt. Perhaps it's not serious and just a precautionary move, but surely the entire country will be a tad worried until they get an update from the physio.
Thanks for joining us on the coverage. Hope to see you for the grand finale. Until then, this is Shashank Kishore saying goodbye on behalf of Sreshth Shah and Venkat Raghav. Cheers

headshotImage.caption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: steered to square third man for an easy single

headshotImage.caption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: new ball, please. He's deposited this over the sightscreen. Lovely sashay down the pitch to meet this on the half-volley as he muscled this away.
sees the flight, drives hard to sweeper cover

full on the pads, tucked to fine leg
bails out of this short ball

dismissalComment.html: holes out at extra cover! Falls just short of a hundred. This was full and wide outside off, and Porterfield tries to slap it over the off side. But fielder in the deep runs across the boundary line and slides across the grass to complete a catch. Excellent innings

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Tamim Iqbal b Abu Jayed
dismissalText.commentary: Kevin O'Brien c Tamim Iqbal b Abu Jayed 3 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75

dismissalComment.html: got him! Back of a length on middle, and O'Brien tries to flat-bat a six over long on. But he toe-ends the shot, and it's gone straight to the man riding the boundary

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Liton Das b Abu Jayed
dismissalText.commentary: Paul Stirling c Liton Das b Abu Jayed 130 (141b 8x4 4x6) SR: 92.19

dismissalComment.html: back of the hand slower ball, and it lands full on leg stump. Stirling tries to muscle this over cow corner, but he doesn't have the power behind the shot. In the air for eternity before the sweeper-fielder on the leg side gets under it. Jayed strikes again. Standing ovation for Stirling

headshotImage.caption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abu Jayed player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Abu Jayed
dismissalText.commentary: Gary Wilson c Shakib Al Hasan b Abu Jayed 12 (6b 2x4 0x6) SR: 200

dismissalComment.html: Jayed has the last laugh! Full on middle, and the attempted cover drive is sliced to point. Five-wicket haul

headshotImage.caption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Saifuddin  player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Saifuddin  player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mark Adair hit wicket b Mohammad Saifuddin 11 (7b 0x4 1x6) SR: 157.14

dismissalComment.html: hit wicket! Full, just outside off, and the attempted drive through the off side is missed. But Adair is so deep in his crease that he chops off stump with his bat

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Saifuddin  player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Saifuddin  player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: George Dockrell b Mohammad Saifuddin 4 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 80

dismissalComment.html: bowled around his legs! Full on middle, and Dockrell exposes his stumps trying to play another paddle. Ball crashes into middle stump and Saifuddin bowls a tidy over to end the innings. Ireland finish on 292 for 8

headshotImage.caption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal b Rankin 57 (53b 9x4 0x6) SR: 107.54

dismissalComment.html: chopped on! Ireland needed one badly and they have one. Tamim with a feeble push away form the body

headshotImage.caption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Liton Das player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Litton Das b McCarthy 76 (67b 9x4 1x6) SR: 113.43

dismissalComment.html: breakthrough! The stumps are broken. Liton 24 short of a hundred. Was a full ball, but slightly slower, and Liton's through his shot too early. Smart delivery

headshotImage.caption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Barry McCarthy player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Shakib Al Hasan retired hurt 50 (51b 4x4 0x6) SR: 98.03

dismissalComment.html: cut away down to square third man

headshotImage.caption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Boyd Rankin player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim c †Wilson b Rankin 35 (33b 5x4 0x6) SR: 106.06

dismissalComment.html: sharp take from the keeper! Breaks the partnership. Full on middle, and going down leg. Mushfiqur tries to flick, but it takes his glove and Wilson dives to his left to take a one-handed stunner

dismissalText.commentary: Mahmudullah not out 35 (29b 2x4 2x6) SR: 120.68

headshotImage.caption: Mosaddek Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mosaddek Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Mosaddek Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mark Adair player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mosaddek Hossain c †Wilson b Adair 14 (17b 1x4 0x6) SR: 82.35

dismissalComment.html: healthy nick and gone! Was looking to guide this down to third man, instead picks out the keeper who takes an excellent catch. Second ODI wicket for Adair.

dismissalText.commentary: Sabbir Rahman not out 7 (8b 1x4 0x6) SR: 87.5

Ireland: 100 runs in 20.5 overs (125 balls), Extras 2

milestones.description: Porterfield and Paul Stirling's 174-run partnership is IRE's highest for the 3rd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 138 between Ed Joyce and Balbirnie
Paul Stirling has broken the record for most sixes (84) in ODIs for IRE, going past Kevin O'Brien's 82
This is the highest match aggregate (586) involving teams Bangladesh & Ireland in ODIs

stories.title: Shakib Al Hasan retires hurt with suspected side strain
stories.subTitle: Ireland v Bangladesh, 6th ODI, Dublin
stories.seoTitle: Shakib Al Hasan retires hurt with suspected side strain
stories.summary: The incident occurred soon after he reached his 42nd ODI half-century during Bangladesh's chase of Ireland's 292

stories.title: Abu Jayed, Liton Das, Tamim Iqbal keep Ireland winless
stories.subTitle: Ireland v Bangladesh, Tri-series 2019, Malahide
stories.seoTitle: Abu Jayed, Liton Das, Tamim Iqbal keep Ireland winless
stories.summary: Paul Stirling's century in vain as Ireland's bowlers struggle against superior batting line-up
